person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A quick survey at the conference centre found few officials who had actually surfed the Internet .

Let's think step by step.

1. A (implied, the author or speaker of the sentence)
2. few officials (a group of people)

There are no explicit "Person" entities mentioned in the paragraph. The paragraph is only stating that there were few officials who had surfed the Internet at the conference center.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
1. few officials (the only explicitly mentioned Person entities in the paragraph)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
